changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.users ( favorite_genre_id integer, user_id bigserial NOT NULL, birthday timestamp(6) without time zone, role character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", email character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", fio character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", password character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", phone character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", CONSTRAINT users_pkey PRIMARY KEY (user_id) )
